report.title: App - Get Standard Mode Plots For User
report.description: List of plots of a given user ID. Used by Karolis to setup app. Report contains IDs hard-coded to live Warehouse.
report.query: SELECT distinct #columns# FROM groups g JOIN groups_users gu on gu.group_id=g.id AND (gu.user_id::text='#warehouse_user_id#' OR '#warehouse_user_id#'='') AND gu.deleted=false JOIN groups_locations gl on gl.group_id=g.id and gl.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.id = gl.location_id AND plot.location_type_id = 17677 AND plot.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_groups_for_plot_attr_val on plot_groups_for_plot_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_groups_for_plot_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 280 AND plot_groups_for_plot_attr_val.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms plot_groups_for_plot on plot_groups_for_plot.id = plot_groups_for_plot_attr_val.int_value AND plot_groups_for_plot.termlist_id=912 LEFT JOIN users u on u.id = gu.user_id AND u.deleted = false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values plot_groups_for_user_attr_val on plot_groups_for_user_attr_val.person_id = u.person_id AND plot_groups_for_user_attr_val.person_attribute_id = 26 AND plot_groups_for_user_attr_val.deleted=false LEFT JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values projects_for_plot_group_attr_val on projects_for_plot_group_attr_val.termlists_term_id = plot_groups_for_user_attr_val.int_value AND projects_for_plot_group_attr_val.int_value=g.id AND projects_for_plot_group_attr_val.termlists_term_attribute_id = 11 AND projects_for_plot_group_attr_val.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms plot_group_terms_for_project_and_user on plot_group_terms_for_project_and_user.id = projects_for_plot_group_attr_val.termlists_term_id AND plot_group_terms_for_project_and_user.termlist_id=912 #joins# WHERE g.website_id=106 AND g.group_type_id=18068 AND (g.id::text='#project_id#' OR '#project_id#'='') AND g.deleted=false
